habtools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Height range

    hr.Rd

    Height range

    hr(data, x, y, L, method = "dem", plot = FALSE)

    Arguments

    data

    A digital elevation model (DEM) in raster format.

    x

    The lower-left x-coordinate of bounding box.

    y

    The lower-left y-coordinate of bounding box.

    L

    The bounding box size (i.e., side length).

    method

    dem (default) is digital elevation model (DEM) in raster format; mesh is a 3D mesh model with vertices.

    plot

    Add bounding box to existing plot of dem.

    Value

    The difference between the lowest and highest point in the bounding box.

    Examples

    hr(horseshoe)
#> [1] 1.371864

plot(horseshoe)
hr(horseshoe, plot=TRUE)
#> [1] 1.371864
hr(horseshoe, -470, 1266, 2, plot=TRUE)

#> [1] 1.091781

# For a 3D mesh.
hr(mcap, method="mesh")
#> [1] 0.2185397
